sentence:
• Shares of General Mills, Inc. GIS tanked 8.9% after reporting fiscal third-quarter 2018 revenues of $3,882 million, below the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $3,886 million
• Shares of MuleSoft, Inc. MULE increased 5.3% after salesforce.com, inc. CRM announced that it was purchasing the company
• Winnebago Industries, Inc.'s WGO shares declined 5% after reporting fiscal second-quarter 2018 earnings per share of $0.62, lower than the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.65
• Monsanto Company MON shares surged 0.6% after the European Union approved its acquisition by Bayer AG
